DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , two-arm , multi-center , Phase II study evaluate efficacy safety pertuzumab combination trastuzumab plus aromatase inhibitor ( AI ) first-line participant HER2-positive hormone receptor-positive advanced breast cancer . Participants randomize one two treatment arm ; Arm A ( pertuzumab combination trastuzumab plus AI ) Arm B ( trastuzumab plus AI ) . Participants may also receive induction chemotherapy ( taxane , either docetaxel paclitaxel ) investigator 's discretion combination assign treatment arm . The anticipated time study treatment disease progression , unacceptable toxicity , withdrawal consent , death whichever occur first .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Pertuzumab Combination With Trastuzumab Plus Aromatase Inhibitor Participants With Metastatic Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 ( HER2 ) -Positive Hormone Receptor-Positive Advanced Breast Cancer
